data.title: Good place for young kids
data.text: Took my grandchildren there until they outgrew it at age 5.  They loved it and it was nice to find somewhere out of the rain for them to climb and play.

data.title: Great place to play
data.text: We love going to Outdoors In, especially when my little ones need to burn off some energy and it's raining outside. The staff is always friendly and helpful.

data.title: Birthday party
data.text: I rented the place for 3 hours. The lady supervising disrespected me in many ways through the night infront on my guest... She was very unprofessional and made my daughters first birthday so stressing.

data.title: Great place for kids!
data.text: Wonderful selection of toys and climbing activities for kids. You can schedule birthday parties, etc for there too. The kids all seem to be having fun. Very clean and family friendly.

data.title: We go all the time
data.text: This is the best idea for coping with Oregon weather. Grandkids love the toys, games, slides so much and they never stop moving. I can stop in at the attached Starbucks for a chai tea latte! LOVE - LOVE this place!

data.title: A great atmosphere for a kid to play and play and play
data.text: We looked around Hillsboro for something to do with our 5 year old. My wife selected this Gem. I was pleasantly surprised as was my 5 year old. Its a complete play ground set Inside a building. Also lots of toys, A rock climbing wall, and so much more. All for $3.50, yes I said three dollars & fifty cents. Wow what a bargain. It also has complimentary WiFi and Starbucks coffee inside. 3 hours later we left and my 5 year old and I will most definitely return. I highly recommend this activity and location
